com.gopivotal.pig

Class HawqPigDataConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gopivotal.pig.HawqPigDataConverter

  • public class HawqPigDataConverter
extends Object
    A utility for converting HAWQ column definitions and data to their related counterparts for Pig.
